pkgmetadata.longdescription: Weighted Iterative Proportional Fitting // Implementation of the weighted iterative proportional fitting (WIPF) procedure for updating/adjusting a N-dimensional array (currently N=3) given a weight structure and some target marginals. Acknowledgements: The author wish to thank Ministerio de Ciencia, Innovacin y Universidades (grant PID2021-128228NB-I00) and Fundacin Mapfre (grant 'Modelizacin espacial e intra-anual de la mortalidad en Espaa. Una herramienta automtica para el clculo de productos de vida') for supporting this research.
